title.value: Empowering the TYPO3 Community: Introducing CKEditor Pack for Enhanced Content Creation

summary.value:

The talk explores how open-source collaboration, a unified plugin ecosystem, and thoughtful editor experience design come together to simplify configuration while unlocking advanced editing capabilities.

content.value:
At T3CON TYPO3 Conference, this talk presented the CKEditor Pack as a new open-source initiative created to enhance and unify rich content editing in TYPO3. Built specifically for the TYPO3 ecosystem, the CKEditor Pack brings together a curated set of editing, collaboration, and productivity features while preserving the familiar TYPO3 look and feel. The goal is simple: reduce fragmentation, simplify configuration, and make advanced editing capabilities accessible out of the box.

The session walks through the motivation behind the project, inspired by successful community models in other CMS ecosystems, and highlights how existing free plugins and maintainers can contribute to a shared, sustainable solution. Through practical examples and a live-style demonstration, the talk shows the benefits for different roles. Editors gain faster, cleaner workflows; admins get better governance and consistency. Integrators benefit from modular architecture and extensibility; and contributors are invited to actively shape the future of the project.

As an open-source, community-first effort, the CKEditor Pack represents a long-term vision for TYPO3 editing: collaborative, powerful, and built together with the ecosystem. The session concludes with a look ahead at whatâ€™s next and how the TYPO3 community can get involved.

Abstract

Join me to explore a new community initiative by T3Planet and CKEditor aimed at transforming content editing in TYPO3. In this session, I will demonstrate the open-source CKEditor Pack, showcasing how it solves everyday challenges through advanced features like real-time collaboration, improved formatting workflows, and seamless media handling all within the familiar TYPO3 environment. This session is not just a demo, but an invitation: be part of the conversation and discover how you can help shape the future of this project to meet the real needs of the TYPO3 community.
